articles.description: A study suggests that raw but not cooked vegetables are associated with a lower risk of cardiovascular disease.
articles.content: If youre trying to eat more vegetables to improve your heart health, you may want to stick with raw produce instead of making lots of vegetarian casseroles and stir-fried dishes. Thats because a new … [+3740 chars]
